answers.answer: I did with my first and was induced at 37 weeks. With this one I kinda am but not as bad I'm 38 weeks today and have been going to a specialist and my regular OB/GYN twice a week for almost a month now. I go in today to talk about an upcoming induction again.
I got a bunch of labs today because they suspect i may have preclamsia i am waiting on the results :-( i am 36 weeks and 4 days not sure what is the next step if it goes positive.

question: Hey ladies, I was to November 20th. But I was admitted into our hospital here last night and was diagnosed with preeclampsia. They're trying to make it to the 37 week deliver me.Wondering if anyone else is going through this.the baby is extremely healthy, I am the one at risk.
title: preclampsia
